attributes.action: Admit that parliament have failed the people it works for
attributes.additional_details: The mess the government have got us into, because making sure a deal was always the way of thinking
attributes.background: We the majority of the referendum voters, voted to leave the EU, we didn’t tick a box stating we wanted a deal before leaving. We have our choice been changed without our authority.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235185
